QuestData.Title: A Walk with Ghosts
QuestData.Description:
Reclaiming these ruins means a lot to the Forsaken. Especially since the war ended, our people have needed something to hold onto, to give us purpose in the wake of everything that's happened to us.
I saw Calia walk toward the throne room. That place holds many memories for her. Many ghosts.
We should check on her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Calia in the throne room of Lordaeron.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Calia in the throne room of Lordaeron.

Objectives.Objective: Enter the Throne Room of Lordaeron
